document_data.name: Cave of the Berserkers
document_data.mainbody: The '''Cave of the Berserkers''' was a cavern system in the [[Spine of the World]] named for the [[Reghedmen]] [[barbarians]] that dwelled within.
document_data.Geography: The system of caves were located within the northern reaches of the [[Spine of the World]] mountains.
document_data.History:
These caves were originally formed by a group of [[dwarven]] prospectors who sought out valuable minerals and metals.

Some time later, the Reghedmen barbarians took up residence within the tunnels. These [[chardalyn berserker|berserkers]] came to be exposed to [[chardalyn]] and were tainted by the substance's inherent powers.
document_data.Inhabitants:
The barbarians that dwelled within the cave were originally members of the [[tribe of the Bear]]. They forsook the worship of the tribe, and rededicated themselves to the Frostmaiden [[Auril]]. In return for their devotion, Auril bestowed upon them a sacred blue flame that granted them continual warmth and a form of limited immortality.

Two [[white dragon]] [[wyrmling]]s also dwelled within the caves, called [[Gelym]] and [[Tyzar]].
